page.title: 04CLUBS IN CANFORD MAGNA.
page.content: {THE MERLEY COMMUNITY ASSOC.}has been building their own centre for 7yrs. It has all been done by a maximum of 15 volunteers,who re-erected the old Ham -worthy Engineering Sports Club,bought for Â£500.It cost Â£2000 to move it.The land was given by Poole Borough Coun- cil.The original wooden building is now having a brick skin built for sec- urity and against fire risk.The hall will be large enough for Badminton & 5 -a-side football.The first event held was the Merley Country Show held on 7th Sept 1985,before building was fin- ished,see slide.Fund raising is still needed,collecting & selling old paper is one way.A Social Club & bar within the Comm.Assoc.is Â£1 per year.A kitch- en is being equipped,& heating has yet to be installed.Future events will be Soup & Carols at Xmas & an Xmas Fair. The Centre will open fully in 1986.
